Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at 51st/Ashland
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 51st, Racine, 47th & Ashland, due to street blockage near 51st/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 51st, Racine, 47th and Ashland, due to street blockage near 51st/Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.
